text_block_list.text:
“There is no curtain for the queen” When she saw such a public 
opinion, she must have laughed.

With her dark hair fluttering, as if it was skipping, with her 
taking the lead the people had no choice but to acknowledge her.
The queen's name was Vodka.

She turned the stage of her dream into a gorgeous solo stage, and 
in her eyes, the scenery of the future that no one else has ever 
seen was vividly reflected.

As the autumn season arrived, the day of 
the “Holy Hoof Festival” has come.

The Derby exhibition, which was prepared with both me and Winning 
Ticket was ready, and it was not well received.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
After that, after that! The Derby at that time was also 
impressive! Right, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I got it, I got it, slowly show me.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
However, you prepared quite well even 
though you had your own race.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
It was hard～. Trainer-san helped me too, 
so I somehow managed to do it!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's right! I haven't had a chance to properly introduce 
Trainer-san to both of you yet, right!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right here is Trainer-san! And this is Taishin and Hayahide!

Narita Taishin and Biwa HayahideーHer classmates, I heard that 
they are also a “synchronization” that debuted at the same time.
choice_data_list: Nice to meet you, I'm her trainer.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …Nice to meet you. I mean, you have it hard.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yeah… It is not difficult to imagine the struggle you went 
through to help Ticket with the exhibition.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Geez! What do you think of me, both of you!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
The order is reversed! Originally, the trainer came to help me 
prepare for the exhibition!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Two people meet at the Derby exhibition then aim for the Derby 
together, this is fate, fate!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ah, speaking of fate! Do you remember the 
promise we made the first time we met?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: That was in your first class, right?

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
So first, I will measure your time. Choose 
the appropriate distance and time.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yes-yes instructor! Is it okay if I 
run the same 2400m as the Derby～?

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Y-Yes… I don't mind, but it's normal for a Horse Girl who has 
just entered the school to start from about half that distance.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Even so! My goal is the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
I-I got… Just to make sure, is there 
anyone willing to run 2400m too?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: here…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Me too, please set it at 2400m.

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Are you girls, serious?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… It-It's no good～! My time, it's not good at all～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: heh… heh…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: …Keh!

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
2400m… The classic distance, it's not 
something you can easily run.

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
First, you have to do what you have to do now, so let's do our 
best so that you can run this distance someday.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… he, I understand～.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Someday I will.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: This distance, I'll show you how to beat it…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Eh, haha! Hey-Hey, both of you! Thanks for running with me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
… It's nothing, I haven't done anything deserving your thanks. It 
was a distance I had to challenge one day.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
In order to get stronger, it is a distance 
that you have to get over.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Then, after all, the 2 of you are aiming for the Derby! 3 people 
aiming for the Derby in the same class…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Waaa～～, It's a drama～～! Let's make sure 
the 3 of us run in the Derby～～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Shut up!… I mean, why are you crying!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Let's race and make a new history with the 
3 of us! In a hot, dramatic Derby!!

As Winning Ticket was talking about the day they met her eyes 
were shining. The 3 girls were together from the first time they 
met and took the first step towards their dream together.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's repeat the promise we made that day one more time! 
Let me hear your voices, one-twoーDerby!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Eh, what? only me!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: The person in charge here is noisy, so let's go to another place.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'm sure there was an event on the outdoor stage.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahh!? Wait!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
That was only a joke. But it is almost 
time for me to go training.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Training? In the middle of the “Holy Hoof Festival”?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Taishin, your next race has been decided.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, I see! Taishin, I'm going to support you!

Even though the race is ahead, I will work hard to train until 
the day of the school event.

The Horse girl called Narita Taishin seemed to have a very stoic 
character, contrary to the impression that it was bumpy.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Well then, to put our spirits in, one more time! Derby!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Again, it's noisy!
A few days laterー

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Turning around the 4th corner and Narita Taishin is in 2nd place! 
Opps, at once! The other Horse Girls came up at once!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin! Go! Get upp!

Narita Taishin ended up in 6th place, 
even with the load cheering.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: … Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about it! For the next race, let's train together!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, but that's fine. For now let me be alone.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah… S-Sorry…

The 3 best friends aiming for the big stage of 
the Derbyー This result made me think that their 
road ahead would be filled with thorns.
